name: Velocity Technology Partners
overview:
“Velocity Technology Partners is a complete IT support and consulting company, skilled in providing computer and networking services. We are not just a support company, but we also take a consultative approach with our clients. We take time to understand your business, and design solutions tailored to your particular needs. Our knowledgeable and highly-skilled technicians, engineers and consultants are available 24-7-365.

We Provide Complete IT Services Including:

Network Design and Implementation
Server Design and Sales
Internet Service Provider Solutions
T1 Voice & Data Cutovers
Document Management Solutions
Desktop Virtualization
Desktop PCs, Tablet PCs, Hardware Sales
Paperless Solutions
Complete Networking Solutions
Computer Hardware and Software Upgrades
Electronic Medical Records (EMR) Consulting
Network Upgrades
Server Virtualization
Multiple Location Environments & Remote Access
Medical Practice IT Support

Managed IT Services
Network and Infrastructure Security Audits
SAN (Storage Area Network) Solutions
System Evaluation
Hardware Repair/Replacement
Technology Profiling
Remote Connectivity
Data Protection and Security
Optimizing Existing Technology
Data Backup and Recovery
24Ã—7 Emergency Support
Secure Wireless Networking
Database Development
Software Development

”
